post:
BODHost Windows VPS Hosting packages are secure and flexible for users who wants to use a Windows environment with complete remote desktop access. We have been providing fully managed hosting solutions with spontaneous round the clock support, for more than 10 years. We use Hyper-V environment for Windows VPS servers.


Our VPS hosting specifications are as follows:

Windows VPS Servers:

VPS Standard

• HDD: 30 GB
• Bandwidth: 600 GB
• RAM: 1 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $39.99/month

VPS Enterprise

• HDD: 45 GB
• Bandwidth: 1 TB
• RAM: 1.5 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $59.99/month

VPS Corporate

• HDD: 65 GB
• Bandwidth: 2 TB
• RAM: 2 GB
• Dedicated IPs: 2
• Price: $79.99/month

Operating System:

• Windows OS: Windows 2008 R2 Standard / Windows 2012 R2 Standard

Control Panels:

• CPanel/WHM with Softaculous: $8.00
• Plesk Web Admin Edition: $3.00
• Plesk Web App Edition: $5.00
• Plesk Web Pro Edition: $7.00
• Plesk Web Host Edition: $14.00

Control Panels Addon:

• Plesk power pack: $5.00
• Plesk Anti-Virus by Dr.Web: $6.00
• Software Firewall + Anti-Virus: Symantec Endpoint Protection: $8.00

Have a question?

Feel free to contact our sales team via Live Chat!
